description: This header defines utility functions for file synchronization and JSON setting persistence within the Utils namespace, including methods to sync file contents with the filesystem and to persist JSON settings to a file.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes the physical file on disk with its in-memory state by opening the file, flushing its buffers, and calling fsync.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON value under a specific key to a file by serializing the JSON object, updating or creating the file, and then ensuring the written data is synchronized with disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
